scripts.windows-start: set "BROWSER=none" && start chrome.exe --user-data-dir=C:/Chrome --disable-web-security https://@$domain8443&&set PORT=8443 &&set HTTPS=true&& set HOST=$domain&& set SSL_CRT_FILE=ssl/server.crt&& set SSL_KEY_FILE=ssl/server.key&& react-scripts start
scripts.mac-dev: HTTPS=true PORT=443 HOST=fidointerop.keyxentic.com SSL_CRT_FILE=ssl/cert.pem SSL_KEY_FILE=ssl/key.pem react-scripts start
scripts.cert: openssl req -x509 -new -nodes -sha256 -utf8 -days 3650 -newkey rsa:2048 -keyout ssl/server.key -out ssl/server.crt -config ssl/ssl.conf && openssl pkcs12 -export -in ssl/server.crt -inkey ssl/server.key -out ssl/server.pfx
